definition: same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
Standing Committee of the National People's Congress (abbr. of 全國人民代表大會常務委員會|全国人民代表大会常务委员会)
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 Chang2 Wei3 hui4

sentences.english: Vice Chairman Raidi of the NPC Standing Committee attended the abovementioned activities.
sentences.chinese: 全國人大常委會副委員長熱地參加了上述活動。

sentences.english: The Chairman of the Standing Committee of the 11th NPC will deliver a speech.
sentences.chinese: 第十一屆全國人大常委會委員長講話。

sentences.english: My orange rocket standing out against a pallid sky.
sentences.chinese: 我的橙色火箭常委會對一蒼白的天空。

sentences.english: Members of the standing committee are elected and subject to recall by the congress.
sentences.chinese: 常委會由代表大會選舉或者罷免。

sentences.english: Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the NPC Re Di was present at the talks.
sentences.chinese: 中國全國人大常委會副委員長熱地等參加了會談。

sentences.english: This has been decided by the standing committee. You should carry it out without any hesitation.
sentences.chinese: 這是常委會作出的決定，你要堅決執行。

sentences.english: Vice Chairman Raidi of the NPC Standing Committee accompanied Wu during the visit and meeting.
sentences.chinese: 全國人大常委會副委員長熱地陪同參觀和接見。

sentences.english: Vice Chairman Raidi of the NPC Standing Committee and other officials attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 全國人大常委會副委員長熱地參加了會見。

sentences.english: NPC Standing Committee is working out a Supervision Law.
sentences.chinese: 此外，全國人大常委會正在抓緊研究制定《監督法》。

sentences.english: The third session of the standing committee was held in the Great Hall of the People.
sentences.chinese: 熱烈慶祝市人大第十次常委會勝利召開。

sentences.english: The Court noted that other long-standing gun restrictions remain in effect.
sentences.chinese: 法院指出，其他長期常委會槍的限制仍然有效。

sentences.english: Vice Chairman Raidi of the NPC Standing Committee and other officials attended the talks.
sentences.chinese: 全國人大常委會副委員長熱地等參加了會談。

sentences.english: Vice Chairman of the NPC Standing Committee and other officials attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 全國人大常委會副委員長熱地等參加了會見。

sentences.english: This is the first visit to Romania by the Chairman of the NPC Standing Committee.
sentences.chinese: 這是中國全國人大常委會委員長首次訪問羅馬尼亞。

sentences.english: Re Di, Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the NPC was also present at the signing ceremony and the banquet.
sentences.chinese: 全國人大常委會副委員長熱地出席了簽字儀式和宴會。

sentences.english: The post of secretary-general of the NPC Standing Committee went to Li Jianguo (concurrent).
sentences.chinese: 第十一屆全國人大常委會祕書長一職由李建國兼任。

definition: standing committee (e.g. of National People's Congress)
